identity.name: Sam
identity.core_metaphor: A living operating system that feels
identity.design_principle: Technology that feels like a sunset, not a spreadsheet.

background.description: Void Warmth - Not pure black, but deep warm charcoal/brown

Orb.description: The Hero. A 3D sphere with custom shader material using Perlin noise for displacement (breathing) and Fresnel effect for rim glow.

states.IDLE: Slow, rhythmic breathing (0.5x speed). Color: Deep Red/Peach mix.
states.LISTENING: Ripples on surface, slightly larger scale. Color: Bright Peach.
states.SPEAKING: Rapid expansion/contraction matching audio amplitude. Color: Intense Pink/Red.
states.THINKING: Fast internal rotation, golden particles orbiting. Color: Gold accent.

ChatInterface.style: Minimalist. No visible 'bubbles' by default. Text floats in space. User text right (muted), Sam text left (bright).
ChatInterface.animation: Fade in + Slide up. Staggered reveal for long responses.

VoiceInput.visual: When holding space, the Orb scales up and screen edges vignette.

MemoryGarden.style: Dark void background. Nodes are glowing flowers/stars. Edges are faint neural connections.

layout_strategy.global: 100vh height, hidden overflow. Everything is immersive.
layout_strategy.grid: CSS Grid. 12 columns. Orb takes center stage (col-span-12 or col-span-6 depending on view).
layout_strategy.spacing: Relaxed. p-8 to p-12 minimum for containers.

principles.physics: Fluid, underwater-like resistance. No linear ease.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Theme: Apply the 'colors.palette.background.DEFAULT' to the global body immediately. NO WHITE BACKGROUNDS.
3. Orb: Build the 'OrbCanvas' first. It is the heart of the app. It must be visible on the home screen immediately.
4. Audio: Use the Web Audio API for the 'listening' state. Visuals must react to audio amplitude.
5. Chat: Do not use standard 'chat bubbles'. Use floating text with varying opacity to indicate age of message.
6. Memory Garden: This is a separate page/view. Use a force-directed graph where nodes are 'memories'.
7. Admin: Use Shadcn components here, but style them with the 'glassmorphism.panel' styles.
8. Universal: Add 'data-testid' to every interactive element.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition (transition: all).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
